name: FITNESS CONSULTATION
description: Through a short survey, conversation, and a movement assessment, your coach will prescribe the perfect program to get you started and on track to meet your fitness goals.

name: GROUP WORKOUTS
description: Full-body workouts are designed to build strength and endurance, using the energy of a small group or team of people around you and the expertise of the coach to maximize your results.

name: ONE-ON-ONE TRAINING
description: One-on-one personalized workouts with your coach are designed to make you stronger from the inside out.
